english.segment1: I open my mouth and You speak for me. You move the mountains and roll back the sea
english.segment2: I will not afraid. I will never be ashamed. For You are with me. You are with me
english.segment3: I've seen enough to know. That You're my only hope. I don't want to go. If You're not with me
english.segment4: We open our hands and You reach for us. You are the motion of the universe
